text: A Journey To The Center Of The Earth is a 1977 Australian animated film originally based on the 1864 novel Journey to the Center of the Earth by Jules Verne. It was directed by Richard Slapczynski from a screenplay by John Palmer and produced by Walter J. Hucker. == References== ==External links== * Category:1977 animated films Category:1977 films Category:Australian animated speculative fiction films Category:Films based on Journey to the Center of the Earth
title: A Journey to the Center of the Earth (1977 film)
